# trinogateway Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "trinogateway" {
  endpoint = "http://trino-gateway:8080"

  # login = "admin"
  # password = "admin"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `endpoint` (String) Trino gateway endpoint

### Optional

- `login` (String, Sensitive) login
- `password` (String, Sensitive) password
